sqlMap.select:
select DISTINCT BILL_NATRUE billNatrue, APPLY_NO applyNo, BILL_TYPE billType, BILL_TITLE billTitle, OPEN_BAND openBand, BILL_RECEIPT billReceipt, BILL_CONTENT billContent, BILL_RECEIVE_PHONE billReceivePhone, BILL_RECEIVE_ADDRESS billReceiveAddress, BILL_STATUS billStatus, SUPPLY_NO supplyNo, CUST_NO custNo, COMPANY_NAME companyName, REGISTER_ADDRESS registerAddress, REGISTER_PHONE registerPhone, OPEN_BAND openBand, BAND_CARD bandCard, BILL_RECEIVE_NAME billReceiveName, BILL_RECEIVE_MAIL billReceiveMail, BILL_PROVINCE billProvince, BILL_CITY billCity, BILL_AREA billArea from T_BUS_BILL where BILL_STATUS = '1'
APPLY_NO = #applyNo#
ORDER_NO = #orderNo#
BILL_NATRUE = #billNatrue#
SUPPLY_NO = #supplyNo#
CUST_NO = #custNos#
INSERT_DT>= #startTime#
INSERT_DT< #endTime#
BILL_MONEY >= #startAmt#
BILL_MONEY < #endAmt#

select count(1) from T_BUS_BILL where BILL_STATUS = '1'
ORDER_NO = #orderNo#
CUST_NO = #custNo#
BILL_NATRUE = #billNatrue#
INSERT_DT>= #startTime#
INSERT_DT< #endTime#

SELECT t3.GUIGE goodsName, substr(t3.c1,1,INSTR(t3.c1,',',1,3)-1) guigee, SUM(t2.goods_money) totalAmt, SUM(t2.goods_count) totalNum FROM ( SELECT * FROM T_BUS_BILL t WHERE t.apply_no = #applyNo#) t1 LEFT JOIN t_bus_order t2 LEFT JOIN data_cp t3 ON t3.cpdm=t2.goods_no ON t1.order_no=t2.order_no GROUP BY t3.GUIGE,substr(t3.c1,1,INSTR(t3.c1,',',1,3)-1)

SELECT t1.CUST_NO custNo, t1.cust_name custName, t1.user_phone phone, apply_no applyNo FROM t_user_base_info t1 INNER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT t.cust_no,t.supply_no,t.apply_no,t.INSERT_DT FROM T_BUS_BILL t where BILL_STATUS = '1' and t.supply_no = #supplyNo# ) t2 ON t1.cust_no=t2.cust_no where 1=1
(t1.cust_name like '%$query$%' or t1.user_phone like '%$query$%')
order by t2.INSERT_DT DESC

SELECT count(DISTINCT T1.apply_no) FROM T_BUS_BILL T1 join T_USER_BASE_INFO T2 on T1.CUST_NO=T2.CUST_NO WHERE T1.BILL_STATUS = '1' AND T1.SUPPLY_NO = #supplyNo#
(t2.cust_name like '%$query$%' or t2.user_phone like '%$query$%')
sqlMap.update: UPDATE T_BUS_BILL SET BILL_STATUS = '2' WHERE APPLY_NO = #applyNo#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DISTINCT BILL_NATRUE billNatrue, BILL_TYPE billType, CUST_NO custNo, BILL_TITLE billTitle, COMPANY_NAME companyName , BILL_RECEIVE_NAME billReceiveName, BILL_RECEIVE_ADDRESS billReceiveAddress, BILL_RECEIVE_PHONE billReceivePhone, BILL_RECEIVE_MAIL billReceiveMail, BILL_PROVINCE billProvince, BILL_CITY billCity, BILL_AREA billArea from T_BUS_BILL WHERE APPLY_NO=#applyNo#
